chapters.title: Chapter 34: Journey to Salidar
chapters.info: Bela, p. 465 (654)—Short, shaggy mare that Egwene rode out of Emond's Field when she first left with Moiraine and Lan. Bela actually belongs to Tam al'Thor, and Rand suggested her as a way to take Egwene with them. Siuan rode her out of Tar Valon in the chaos surrounding Elaida's coup.
